"Smart" Toothbrush with sensors: A toothbrush with sensors that can detect areas of your mouth that need more attention, and provide personalized feedback and coaching to improve your brushing technique.
Toothbrush with built-in UV light: A toothbrush with a built-in UV light that can help kill bacteria and viruses in your mouth, reducing the risk of oral health problems.

Toothbrush with augmented reality: A toothbrush with augmented reality technology that can provide a virtual tour of your mouth, showing you where to brush and how to improve your oral hygiene routine.
Toothbrush with a built-in water flosser: A toothbrush with a built-in water flosser that can help remove food particles and plaque from between your teeth, improving your overall oral health.

Toothbrush with a built-in app: A toothbrush with a built-in app that can track your brushing habits, provide personalized recommendations for improving your oral hygiene routine, and even schedule reminders for you to brush your teeth.
